mapper.select: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW_NUM, alias.* FROM( SELECT a.article_id, a.article_title, a.pic_id, a.category_id, p.pic_url FROM ARTICLE a, PICTURE p WHERE a.pic_id = p.pic_id and a.category_id = #{category_id} ORDER BY article_id DESC )alias )WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{num}+1 and #{num}+20

SELECT TRUNC(sysdate, 'DDD') AS recommend_Date, alias.* FROM( SELECT article_title, article_id, (article_view + article_like + article_reply + article_share) AS count FROM article WHERE pic_id IS NOT NULL AND TRUNC(article_date, 'DDD') BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate-1) AND TRUNC(sysdate, 'DDD') )alias WHERE ROWNUM <=15
